## encode variable

Encode parameters for use in a querystring.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encode: typeof qs.stringify
```

## Remarks

This is a wrapper of `qs.stringify` from the `qs` library.

See the [qs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/qs) package for more info.
